abstract: The session is saving outstanding data and finishing up.
overview:
## Discussion

This state occurs  after your app calls [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/finish()]. The app should keep the session alive until it reaches `.completed` state to ensure all data has been saved.  The session will automatically move to `.completed` once all data is saved.

# ObjectCaptureSession.CaptureState.finishing

**Case**

The session is saving outstanding data and finishing up.

## Declaration

```swift
case finishing
```

## Discussion

This state occurs  after your app calls [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/finish()]. The app should keep the session alive until it reaches `.completed` state to ensure all data has been saved.  The session will automatically move to `.completed` once all data is saved.
title: ObjectCaptureSession.CaptureState.finishing
